ygData.subject: update on darkreaver
ygData.msgSnippet: i have learned that (at least in the beta) the darkreavers are located in lower guk. however, knowing the hell you have to go thru in lower guk to get the
ygData.messageBody:
i have learned that (at least in the beta) the darkreavers are located in
lower guk. however, knowing the hell you have to go thru in lower guk to get
the paladin's ghoulsbane weapon, i imagine that you'd need a lvl 30-35 party
to obtain one. i've also heard that black plate armor that MAY or MAY NOT be
sk-only was also found in lower guk during beta. wether or not any of this
is still there i can't say, but it's worth checking out.

also... from what we know, the darkreaver has an attack of 20. the fiery
avenger, the paladin's best weapon, has by all accounts an attack of 35,
besides casting lava bolt. this implies to me that the darkreaver is NOT our
most powerful holy sword. if nobody knows the location of our lvl 50 weapon,
it is probably because nobody has ever played their SK up to lvl 50 before..
so keep running quests, report ones that dont work, and keep an eye out for
rumors of powerful equipment ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
